info.title: Xano Metadata API - AGENT
info.description: The Metadata API provides support to programatically manage your Xano instance and uses Access Tokens to control access.

put.summary: Update agent trigger security configuration and access controls
put.description:
Update agent trigger security configuration and access controls

Authentication: required

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

put.description:
Update agent details using XanoScript

Authentication: required

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

schema.example:
agent foo {
  canonical = "custom"
  llm = {
    type         : "anthropic"
    system_prompt: "You are a helpful AI Agent."
    max_steps    : 5
    prompt       : ""
    model        : "claude-4-sonnet-20250514"
    temperature. : 1
    reasoning    : true
    baseURL      : ""
    headers      : ""
  }
}
